lead_paragraph: Sri Lanka were forced to follow on 397 runs adrift on the third morning of the second test after England's bowlers took just 17 minutes to claim the final two wickets they needed at Durham.

headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka Face a Battle After England Enforce Follow On
headline.main: Sri Lanka Face a Battle After England Enforce Follow On
